title: Lock Haven, Pennsylvania
summary: Lock Haven is the county seat of Clinton County, in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania. Located near the confluence of the West Branch Susquehanna River and Bald Eagle Creek, it is the principal city of the Lock Haven Micropolitan Statistical Area, itself part of the Williamsportâ€“Lock Haven combined statistical area. At the 2010 census, Lock Haven's population was 9,772.
